sentences.en: A cabal of Appalachian district directors will undertake a palace revolution.
sentences.cn: 阿巴拉契山脉地区的一小撮头面人物正企图谋反.

sentences.en: And then I want Cabal and Forgotten has unique building and unit.
sentences.cn: 然后我想卡瓦尔和被遗忘的具有独特的建筑和单位.

sentences.en: CABAL : No, generals, I will not alow that. My survival is paramount.
sentences.cn: 不, 将军们, 我不允许这样. 我的生存是至关重要的.

sentences.en: CABAL : The Tacitus is necesarry, the extermination of Tratos was necesarry.
sentences.cn: 塔西佗是必须的, 消灭特拉托斯是必须的.

sentences.en: He had been chosen by a cabal of fellow senators.
sentences.cn: 他被参议员同伴们选入了一个政治阴谋小集团。

sentences.en: He had been chosen by a secret government cabal .
sentences.cn: 他已被一个秘密的政府阴谋集团选中。

sentences.en: How loyal are you to your fellow cabal members?
sentences.cn: 你对你的结社成员忠诚吗?
你的结社是如何建立的?

sentences.en: Is there a rival in your cabal ( for power, affection or leadership )?
sentences.cn: 你在结社里有竞争者嘛 ( 为了力量, 影响力,还是领导地位 )?

sentences.en: It is unfortunately not the highest score for your cabal. But better luck next time!
sentences.cn: 7很不幸的,这不是你们阵营最高的得分.但是祝福你们队伍下次能有更好的表现!

sentences.en: Lately many of our Earth allies are noticing our affect upon the dark cabal.
sentences.cn: 最近很多我们地球的盟友注意到了我们对于黑暗势力的影响.

sentences.en: Obviously, there is a cabal, a cold war against Chian!
sentences.cn: 显然, 背后是一场包围中国的阴谋, 一场新的冷战!

sentences.en: The illegal aspects of the cabal's governance are glaring and ubiquitous.
sentences.cn: 黑暗势力的非法统治是显而易见的并无处不在.

sentences.en: We are pleased to announce that CABAL Online will soon cease charging a monthly subscription fee.
sentences.cn: 我们很荣幸地宣布,惊天动地将取消游戏月费.

words.tran_cn: 阴谋（尤指政治上的）；阴谋集团

trans.tran_cn: （政治）阴谋小集团，（尤指政治上的）阴谋
trans.tran_en: a small group of people who make secret plans, especially in order to have political power
